caption: "A possibly ceramic vase-type object with a light green hue and a cylindrical shape. The tapered rim suggests it may be designed for holding flowers or decorative purposes. While resembling a vase, the presence of a small opening at the top hints at potential functional affordances like pouring or serving. It is placed on a mantelpiece alongside other decorative items such as framed pictures and a lamp, contributing to an elegant living room setting."
